function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of essential amenities in apartments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air exchange in civil constructions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and sedentarity in lockdown contributing to non-communicable diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Housing crisis due to deteriorating real estate assets","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green spaces in urban environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban heat islands and health impacts of heat waves","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for energy for cooling indoor environments in summer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absorption of polluting agents and reduction of fine dust","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of well-being and social relationships through green elements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of greenery in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to greenery during confinement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural elements visible from windows in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared living spaces and crowded environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy and accessibility in living spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ergonomic and safety considerations in living spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowded living conditions leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Damp and degraded housing conditions leading to health problems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate living space hindering physical distancing and well-being","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct association between crowding and negative health outcomes, including infectious diseases like tuberculosis and covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spaces accentuate health risks and interfere with productivity in remote working and school performances","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in co-housing or condominium areas hinders adaptation to increased need for space and social distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Functional inconsistencies and interferences within the same building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous presence of units and spaces with incoherent functional use","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality iaq concerns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for building hygiene principles in densely built-up areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of thermal comfort and indoor air quality iaq in building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to adopt a performance-based design approach for natural daylighting and ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality due to contamination from chemical and biological pollutants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through ventilation systems and air extractors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development and survival of bacteria and mold in ventilation systems and air filters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in living environments leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to potential contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of genetic material of sars-cov-2 in urban wastewater as an indicator of potential virus presence in the area.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus survival in stools and transmission through wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe drinking water in places without centralized water treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distrust towards tap water and alternative water sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring and disinfection of liquid waste","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased production of organic and inorganic waste","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling programs","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prohibited waste sorting in buildings with sars-cov-2 positive or suspected subjects","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of returnable waste practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Replacement of regular bins with smart bins for continuous monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of smart home systems in larger housing units","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on internet and wi-fi networks for operation and remote control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of living environments into multi-functional spaces during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excessive use of it systems in housing units due to smart working, online lessons, and entertainment activities increases the risk of indoor contagious disease propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new high-performing computer networks like 5g may result in increased exposure of the population to radio frequency electromagnetic fields, leading to potential health risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emission of volatile organic compounds vocs from finishing materials and furnishings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistence of viruses on inanimate surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of antibacterial and antiviral materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
